snippet: A standoff between the Justice Department and an elected county attorney in Montana ended with an agreement under which local prosecutors promised to improve their response to sexual assault cases.
abstract: Standoff between Justice Department and Fred Van Valkenburg, elected attorney for Missoula County, Mont, ends with an agreement under which local prosecutors promise to improve their response to sexual assault cases.
lead_paragraph: A standoff between the Justice Department and an elected county attorney in Montana ended with an agreement under which local prosecutors promised to improve their response to sexual assault cases.

headline.main: Montana: Prosecutors Agree to Improve Sex Assault Response
headline.print_headline: Montana: Prosecutors Agree to Improve Sex Assault Response
